* ❓ Questions?
          Use Stackoverflow (http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/unchainedshop)
* 💡 Feature requests?
          Visit the evolution repository (https://github.com/unchainedshop/unchained-evolution).
* ❗️ Bug?
          This is the right place!

Before reporting a bug, please check for existing or closed issues
first.

### This bug report should include:
- [ ] A short, but descriptive title. The title doesn't need "Unchained" in it.
- [ ] The url where the problem appears.
- [ ] The operating system and exact browser version used seeing the bug
- [ ] The expected behavior.
- [ ] The actual behavior.
-->
